attributes.action: ban the wearing of burkas in public places
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Banning the wearing of burkas in public places within the whole of the UK.  Especially, in those places where ID is needed and/or the use of CCTV. There is nothing wrong with the hijab.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
